ModMetaData.name: Re-Till
ModMetaData.author: Ben Lubar
ModMetaData.description:
Makes tilled soil from various mods built by growers rather than builders. Does NOT add tilled soil. You will need another mod to do that.
If you have Vanilla Plants Expanded installed, also adds an "auto-till" toggle to growing zones.
Additionally, patches construction so that building terrain under any plant that takes longer to cut than a dandelion no longer cuts the plant if the terrain's fertility would support the plant.
Supported mods:
- Vanilla Plants Expanded (by Oskar Potocki, Sarg Bjornson, and Chowder) - Tilled Soil (by Sam_) - RimWorld: Ideology (by Ludeon Studios) - Farmland (by LadyCookie)
